lead_paragraph: Bipartisan calls for prompt, strong reform in the wake of the economic crisis have quieted, and some legislators have changed their tune.
snippet: Bipartisan calls for prompt, strong reform in the wake of the economic crisis have quieted, and some legislators have changed their tune.

headline.main: Views on Reform, Then and Now
headline.seo: Some Legislators Change Tune on Reform as Crisis Recedes
headline.print_headline: Views on Reform, Then and Now
